profile:
Recently awarded the title of Best of Eastern Ontario for Roofing & Siding companies by HomeStars, Rydel Roofing has more than 30 years of experience as Ottawa's premier roofing service companies. Boasting an A+ BBB Rating, a perfect Facebook Review score and a 97% customer review rating on HomeStars, our business is driven by a passion for elevated customer service, quality craftsmanship and old fashioned honesty. We have been certified to install almost every major roofing and siding product in North America so you can rest assured that our projects are covered under warranty.

Need financing? Ask our team how you can get 24 month ZERO INTEREST equal payments on your latest project! 

Services/Products:
Asphalt Roofing, Metal Roofing, Flat Roofing, Roofing Repairs, Eavestrough and Gutter, Siding, Roofing Products, Roofing Ventilation, Commercial Roofing, Residential Roofing

Brands
IKO, CertainTeed, Owens Corning, BP, GAF, James Hardie, Genteck, Euroshield, Wakefield Bridge, Heritage, Ameri-Cana, Junior H-F, T-Rex, Velux Skylights, Duraflow, Venmar

In business since: 2012

http://rydelroofing.com/
1800 Woodward Dr, Ottawa, ON K2C 0P7
(613) 656-8606
products: Eavestrough and gutter, roofing ventilation, roofing products and roofing skylight
services: When you need siding and roofing services in Ottawa and surroundings area, you want a team that can quickly arrive onsite to complete the task. We have teams of qualified workers for both residential and commercial clients that are ready to respond quickly and effectively when you have a roofing problem that needs prompt attention. Our services includes roofing, siding, roof repairs, evastrough, snow and ice removal, soffit and fascia
brands: IKO, CertainTeed, Owens Corning, BP, GAF, James Hardie, Genteck, Euroshield, Wakefield Bridge, Heritage, Ameri-Cana, Junior H-F, T-Rex, Velux Skylights, Duraflow, Venmar
specialities: 100% customer satisfaction and 24/7 emergency service for roof repairs
memberships: Ottawa Home Builders Association, WSIB, Aviva Third Party Liability Insurance, Baeumler Approved
